description: A representation of the capability of equipment or equipment classes that is committed, available, or unattainable for a specific time shall be presented as an equipment capability.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.02-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 2: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The related object(s) makes up part of this equipment capability as the whole

contents.name: hasValuesOf
contents.description: The values in the equipment capability property are for this equipment capability.

contents.name: correspondsToEquipmentClass
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the equipment model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated equipment class or set of equipment classes of the specification for a specific process segment

contents.name: correspondsToEquipment
contents.description: A cross-model association to element in the equipment model as explained in Clause 3.3.8. Identifies the associated equipment or set of equipment of the specification for a specific process segment. Typically, either equipment class or equipment is defined

enumValues.name: committed
enumValues.comment: : capacity that is committed for future productive use.

enumValues.name: unattainable
enumValues.comment: capacity that is not attainable for future productive use given the equipment condition, equipment utilization, personnel availability or material availability.

enumValues.name: available
enumValues.comment: capacity that is available for additional future productive use.

enumValues.name: used
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity with acceptable quality.

enumValues.name: unused
enumValues.comment: a historical value that defines the portion of the capacity that was not used or had unacceptable quality.

enumValues.name: total
enumValues.comment: the sum of used and unused capability or the sum of available, unattainable and committed capability.

contents.name: reason
contents.description: Defines the reason for the capability type.

contents.name: confidenceFactor
contents.description: Measure of the confidence of the ability to obtain the capacity value.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: spatialDefinition
contents.description: Spatially defines the equipment as a zero-dimensional point, one dimensional line, or two dimensional shape or three dimensional solid.

contents.name: operationalLocationRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

contents.name: operationalLocation
contents.description: Identifies the operational location of the equipment specified by this equipment segment specification

contents.name: operationalLocationType
contents.description: Indicates whether the operational location attribute refers to an operational location object or contains a description of the operational location. Mandatory where an operational location attribute is specified

enumValues.name: operationalLocation
enumValues.description: operational location attribute references an operational location;

enumValues.name: description
enumValues.description: operational location attribute contains a description of the operational location, such as a street address.

contents.name: equipmentUse
contents.description: Defines the capability use of the equipment class or equipment

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: The starting time associated with the equipment capability.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: The ending time associated with the equipment capability.

contents.name: quantity
contents.description: Specifies the amount of resources used in the parent segment

contents.name: quantityUnitOfMeasure
contents.description: The unit of measure of the associated quantity
